title: Thin Two jaw Bearing Puller/Remover 30mm - 90mm by U.S.PRO Tools AT091
description: Suitable for the professional or occasional user. Ideal for pulling bearings in tight spaces. Specially designed working on small bearings, gears and bushes, used on a wide range of automotive and engineering applications. Fully adjustable jaws. Manufactured from chrome vanadium steel and then a black phosphate coating for strength and durability as well as rust and corrosion resistance. Reversible claw legs make it suitable for use as an internal or external bearing puller. Fine threaded thrust screw with ball bearing tip. Specifications Suitable for items 30mm 90mm in diameter. (applicable bearing dimension) Working depth 100mm. Jaws thickness 1.5mm.
